summary: Zapata County is a county in the U.S.
full_text: Zapata is a census-designated place  in and the county seat of Zapata County, Texas, United States. The population was 5,089 at the 2010 census. As an unincorporated community, Zapata has no municipal government but like all 254 Texas counties has four elected county commissioners chosen by single-member districts and a countywide elected administrative judge.
title: Zapata, Texas
